name: Sundae Morning
description:
Sundae Morning is a game where nothing is as it seems. That fire hydrant you see? It may actually be a dog or a taxi.

Your focus as the player is to find ice cream sundaes by revealing the true forms of objects in the world around you. 

Unfortunately, there are dirty syringe needles mixed in as well. Luckily though, when you reveal an object's true form it sends out a pulse that slowly gives you hints as to what nearby objects really are.

Do your best to find enough of the tasty ice cream in time and steer clear of the nasty needles. Enjoy!

* Use of a controller is recommended.
